DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate reproducibility overactive bladder symptom score ( OABSS ) evaluate correlation measure OAB symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Reproducibility Study Overactive Bladder Symptom Score OABSS
DOC.criteria: Symptoms OAB 3 month longer At least 1 urgency episode last 3 day Symptoms OAB verify 3day micturition diary prior Visit 1 , define : Number micturition per day ≥8 Number urgency episodes 3 day ≥1 Significant stress incontinence mixed stress/urge incontinence Subjects indwell catheter practice intermittent selfcatheterization Symptomatic urinary tract infection , chronic inflammation Diabetic neuropathy Drug nondrug treatment OAB start , quit change 4 week Participation clinical trial 30 day
